member.name: AndroidJavaClass
member.summary: Construct an AndroidJavaClass from the class name.

Section.Summary: AndroidJavaClass is the Unity representation of a generic instance of java.lang.Class.

member.name: AndroidJavaObject
member.summary: Construct an AndroidJavaObject based on the name of the class.

member.name: Call
member.summary: Calls a Java method on an object (non-static).

member.name: CallStatic
member.summary: Call a static Java method on a class.

member.name: Get
member.summary: Get the value of a field in an object (non-static).

member.name: GetRawClass
member.summary: Retrieve the raw jclass pointer to the Java class.

member.name: GetRawObject
member.summary: Retrieve the raw jobject pointer to the Java object.

member.name: GetStatic
member.summary: Get the value of a static field in an object type.

member.name: Set
member.summary: Set the value of a field in an object (non-static).

member.name: SetStatic
member.summary: Set the value of a static field in an object type.
